how you search for those tracks

To find these tracks, I used the Spotify API to search for tracks by Dire Straits. I entered a query that included the band's name and then retrieved results listing some of their most popular songs according to the data available on Spotify. From those results, I pulled information such as the name of the tracks, the album they are from, a link to their Spotify page, and any available album artwork.

This allows me to provide you with a detailed listing of tracks, making it easier for you to explore and listen to Dire Strait’s hits! If you're interested in finding more, I can repeat the process with different queries or settings to uncover even more about their musical library.
